default.title: Old shingles
default.desc: Asphalt roofs often age out at 18–22 years. Granule loss and brittle tabs increase leak risk.

default.title: Flashing & vents
default.desc: Improper flashing around chimneys and vents is a top source of leaks.

Southeast.title: Algae streaking
Southeast.desc: Humidity and shade lead to dark streaks; inhibits curb appeal and can signal wear.

Midwest.title: Ice dams
Midwest.desc: Freeze–thaw cycles push water under shingles at eaves; proper underlayment is key.

Texas.title: Wind & hail
Texas.desc: Storm seasons cause shingle bruising and lifted tabs; timely checks prevent rot.

Coast.title: Salt & wind
Coast.desc: Salt air and crosswinds accelerate shingle edge wear and flashing issues.
